name: Show GES Columns
action: <*ALLOWATTRIBUTES(GAS_MeterSuite_Labor_GES_%,GAS_MeterSuite_Addi_Labor_GES_%)*><*CTX ( Container(Gas_MeterSuite_Engineering_Labor_Container).Column(GES Eng).SetPermission(Editable) )*><*CTX ( Container(Gas_MeterSuite_Engineering_Labor_Container).Column(GES Eng % Split).SetPermission(Editable) )*><*CTX ( Container(Gas_MeterSuite_Engineering_Labor_Container).Column(GES_Unit_Regional_Cost).SetPermission(Editable) )*><*CTX ( Container(Gas_MeterSuite_Engineering_Labor_Container).Column(GES_Regional_Cost).SetPermission(Editable) )*><*CTX ( Container(Gas_MeterSuite_Engineering_Labor_Container).Column(GES_ListPrice).SetPermission(Editable) )*><*CTX ( Container(Gas_MeterSuite_Engineering_Labor_Container).Column(GES_WTW_Cost).SetPermission(Editable) )*><*CTX ( Container(Gas_MeterSuite_Engineering_Labor_Container).Column(GES_MPA_Price).SetPermission(Hidden) )*><*CTX ( Container(Gas_MeterSuite_Additional_Labor_Container).Column(GES Eng).SetPermission(Editable) )*><*CTX ( Container(Gas_MeterSuite_Additional_Labor_Container).Column(GES Eng % Split).SetPermission(Editable) )*><*CTX ( Container(Gas_MeterSuite_Additional_Labor_Container).Column(GES_Unit_Regional_Cost).SetPermission(Editable) )*><*CTX ( Container(Gas_MeterSuite_Additional_Labor_Container).Column(GES_Regional_Cost).SetPermission(Editable) )*><*CTX ( Container(Gas_MeterSuite_Additional_Labor_Container).Column(GES_ListPrice).SetPermission(Editable) )*><*CTX ( Container(Gas_MeterSuite_Additional_Labor_Container).Column(GES_WTW_Cost).SetPermission(Editable) )*><*CTX ( Container(Gas_MeterSuite_Additional_Labor_Container).Column(GES_MPA_Price).SetPermission(Hidden) )*>
